verbs.description: [ARG0: Axios] [V: reports] [ARG1: that Donald Trump has tried at least four times to convince Attorney General Jeff Sessions to withdraw his recusal from the Russia investigation and take control of it , presumably so he can either fire Robert Mueller or limit the scope of that investigation . Axios reports that Donald Trump [V: has] tried at least four times to convince Attorney General Jeff Sessions to withdraw his recusal from the Russia investigation and take control of it , presumably so he can either fire Robert Mueller or limit the scope of that investigation . Trump told Sessions he ’d be a “ hero ” to conservatives if …
